name: BDataGrid
sample:
<BDataGrid context={context}
    dataSource={self.state.rows}
    searchText={self.state.searchText}
    columns={columns}
    minHeight={350}
    enableRowSelect={false}
    enableCellSelect={true}
    multiSelection={false}
    showCheckbox={true}
